sources.description: Teen Bhubaner Paare  (তিন ভুবনের পারে) is a  Bengali  movie, inspired by  Samaresh Basu 's  novel , released in 1969. The songs "Hoyto Tomari Jonno"(হয়তো তোমারই জন্য) & "Jibone Ki Pabo Na"(জীবনে কি পাবো না) sung by  Manna Dey  are still very famous among Bengali youth. The film was a big hit in the history of Bengali Cinema.
